definition: to evaporate/(of cooking) to steam/torch made from hemp stalks or bamboo (old)/finely chopped firewood (old)
to distill/to break a liquid substance up into components by boiling
to steam/to cook in a steamer/to reheat cold food by steaming it

sentences.english: Finally, the molecular distillation is performed to obtain medical-grade high-purity glycerin.
sentences.chinese: 最後進行分子蒸餾，得到藥用級的高純度的甘油。

sentences.english: The volatile oils of Zanthoxylum schinifolium were extracted by water vapor distillation.
sentences.chinese: 採用水蒸氣蒸餾法提取精製香椒子中的揮發油。

sentences.english: Process distillation analysers may be classified under the following headings .
sentences.chinese: 過程蒸餾分析儀可按以下標題分類。

sentences.english: What type of whisky is distilled entirely from malted barley?
sentences.chinese: 什麼樣的威士忌完全從大麥麥芽中蒸餾而來？

sentences.english: Like water can be made pure by distilling it.
sentences.chinese: 如同水可通過蒸餾淨化。

sentences.english: I'm afraid we only have distilled water. Is that all right?
sentences.chinese: 不好意思我們這隻有蒸餾水，可以嗎？

sentences.english: We distilled the salt water and made it into drinking water.
sentences.chinese: 我們蒸餾海水使其變成飲用水。

sentences.english: However, she added, the branch is now using distilled water.
sentences.chinese: 她還補充說道，現在這家分店使用的是蒸餾水。

sentences.english: Whiskey is distilled from a fermented mash of grain.
sentences.chinese: 威士忌酒是用蒸餾法從發酵的麥芽漿中提取的。

sentences.english: The distillation column is provided with plates .
It is mounted in a cabinet which connects to the Still Assembly via flexible hoses .
sentences.chinese: 安裝在一個真空櫃內並和蒸餾器模塊用軟管相連。

sentences.english: A spirit distilled from grain or potatoes and flavoured with caraway seeds, among others.
sentences.chinese: 由穀類或馬玲薯及香菜種子蒸餾而來。

sentences.english: Do you wince at the thought of swallowing a tequila worm?
sentences.chinese: 吞嚥一杯蟲子蒸餾酒，這想法有沒有讓你不寒而慄？

sentences.english: The mixture is then distilled in vacua.
sentences.chinese: 然後混合物進行真空蒸餾。

sentences.english: Obtained by way of ancient distillation methods from genetically im proved fresh fruits and flowers.
sentences.chinese: 以古老的蒸餾法由品種改良的鮮果及花朵中萃取而得。

sentences.english: The majority of all brandies are distilled from a fermented mash of grapes.
sentences.chinese: 大多數白蘭地都從葡萄汁中蒸餾獲得。

definition: to brew/to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation
Kavalan, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan/old name of Yilan 宜蘭|宜兰 county, Taiwan/Kavalan, a brand of single malt whisky from Taiwan
to concoct by mixing ingredients/to prepare according to a recipe/to make (a salad, a cocktail, cosmetics etc)
